name: Sonic and The Dark Malsvir DEMO
name_original: Sonic and The Dark Malsvir DEMO
description: An epic adventure between Light and Dark! In order to save the world, Sonic must embark on a quest to find the one thing that can truly destroy The Dark Malsvir! His greatest and hardest challenge awaits him in this 2d Sidescroller! This is just the demo version. The full game will be released when I finish it.  NOTE: (I don't own any of the music, characters, backgrounds, nor Sonic the Hedgehog himself. This is just a Fan Game DEMO.)
